content.rendered:
From 1980 until today, LTL had a continuous growth, characterized by a company policy based on the search for the highest quality, by constant investments in IT, training, equipment and machineries,

by a marked environmental sensitivity guaranteed by periodic monitoring of waste water and emissions. So much operative excellence translates into over 22 million pieces sold worldwide each year.

excerpt.rendered:
From an artisan company to an international reference point.
Leader in the sale of ophthalmic and solar lenses and in offering
highly customized services.
